_data.description: If you have an attacking <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> ally, kill <link=card.Kalgren><style=AssociatedCard>Ren Shadowblade</style></link>'s blocker.
_data.descriptionRaw: If you have an attacking Ephemeral ally, kill Ren Shadowblade's blocker.
_data.flavorText: "As darkness falls, shadows lengthen and lives are cut short..."
_data.name: Fatal Strike

name: Fatal Strike
description: If you have an attacking Ephemeral ally, kill Ren Shadowblade's blocker.
flavor: "As darkness falls, shadows lengthen and lives are cut short..."

_data.flavorText: "Oh, yes. The shadows of the Order will suit our new dark intentions."
_data.name: Yusari the Slayer

name: Yusari the Slayer
flavor: "Oh, yes. The shadows of the Order will suit our new dark intentions."

_data.description:
An ally kicks an enemy into the enemy Nexus, <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>striking</style></link> both.
If the enemy survives, <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> it.
Shuffle a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Lee Sin</style></link> into your deck.
_data.descriptionRaw:
An ally kicks an enemy into the enemy Nexus, striking both.
If the enemy survives, Recall it.
Shuffle a Lee Sin into your deck.
_data.flavorText: "The Dragon must be unleashed, or it will consume me from within." - Lee Sin
_data.name: Lee Sin's Dragon's Rage

name: Lee Sin's Dragon's Rage
description: An ally kicks an enemy into the enemy Nexus, striking both. If the enemy survives, Recall it. Shuffle a Lee Sin into your deck.
flavor: "The Dragon must be unleashed, or it will consume me from within." - Lee Sin

_data.descriptionRaw: Deal 3 to a follower. Phase Gravitum.
_data.flavorText: "Move sure as the moon, Brother." - Alune
_data.name: Calibrum

_data.description: Give an ally +1|+2 and <link=keyword.Lifesteal><sprite name=Lifesteal><style=Keyword>Lifesteal</style></link> this round. <link=vocab.Phase><style=Vocab>Phase</style></link> <link=card.NextWeapon><style=AssociatedCard>Infernum</style></link>.

name: Severum
description: Give an ally +1|+2 and Lifesteal this round. Phase Infernum.

_data.description: Summon a two cost follower from your deck. If it has <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>, activate it. <link=vocab.Phase><style=Vocab>Phase</style></link> <link=card.NextWeapon><style=AssociatedCard>Severum</style></link>.
_data.descriptionRaw: Summon a two cost follower from your deck. If it has Nightfall, activate it. Phase Severum.
_data.flavorText: "A crescent path opens before us." - Alune

description: Summon a two cost follower from your deck. If it has Nightfall, activate it. Phase Severum.
